system.effect: The impact smashes into the arm or whatever the target is holding, ripping it away and leaving the target reeling from the pain. He is Stunned for 1 round and drops anything he was holding in that hand. Roll 1d10; on a result of 1, anything the target was holding in that hand is badly damaged and unusable until repaired.
